sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.persistence

Interface RegistrationMarker<R extends MarkableRegistration>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListenerPersistenceData, ResourcePersistenceData

    public interface RegistrationMarker<R extends MarkableRegistration>
    A registration status marker for MarkableRegistration instances.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R applyRegisteredMark()
      Applies the registered mark by registering or unregistering the underlying registrable object.
      R markRegistered(boolean status)
      Marks registration with the desired registration status.
      R updateRegisteredMark()
      Updates the registered mark according to the current registration status of the underlying registrable object.

    • Method Detail

      • applyRegisteredMark

        R applyRegisteredMark()
        Applies the registered mark by registering or unregistering the underlying registrable object.

        Note: This method propagates runtime exceptions thrown by the registration mechanism of the underlying registrable object.

        Returns:
        registration with updated current registration status

      • updateRegisteredMark

        R updateRegisteredMark()
        Updates the registered mark according to the current registration status of the underlying registrable object.
        Returns:
        registration with updated registered mark

      • markRegistered

        R markRegistered(boolean status)
        Marks registration with the desired registration status. In other words sets the registered mark to the given value.
        Parameters:
        status - the desired registration status
        Returns:
        registration with updated registered mark
